Proverb: Wisdom comes only when you stop looking for it and start living the life the Creator intended for you.
Stand in the light when you want to speak out.
Give me knowledge, so I may have kindness for all.
Before eating, always take a little time to thank the food.
Truth does not happen, it just is.
Stolen food never satisfies hunger.
Thoughts are like arrows:  once released, they strike their mark.  Guard them well or one day you may be your own victim.
When we show our respect for other living things, they respond with respect for us.

Always assume your guest is tired, cold, and hungry, and act accordingly.

Never sit while your seniors stand.

Let your eyes be offended by the sight of lying and deceitful men.

What the people believe is true.
If you see no reason for giving thanks, the fault lies in yourself.
There is no death, only a change of worlds.
All religions are but stepping stones back to God.
When the legends die, the dreams end; there is no more greatness.

If I am in harmony with my family, that's success.
Remember that your children are not your own, but are lent to you by the Creator.
Even in Paradise, living all alone would be Hell.
You can't get rich if you look after your relatives properly.
See how the boy is with his sister and you can know how the man will be with your daughter.

There are no secrets.  There is no mystery.  There is only common sense.
If we wonder often, the gift of knowledge will come.
Don't let yesterday use up too much of today.
The soul would have no rainbow if the eyes had no tears.

The man who freely gives his opinion should be ready to fight fiercely.
A starving man will eat with the wolf.
Seek the ways of the eagle, not the wren.

Man has responsibility, not power.
We are made from Mother Earth and we go back to Mother Earth.
When man moves away from nature, his heart becomes hard.
Cherish youth, but trust old age.
The one who tells the stories rules the world.
He who has great power should use it lightly.
Great chiefs prove their worthiness.
All who have died are equal.
It is no longer good enough to cry peace, we must act peace, live peace, and live in peace.
The Great Spirit is always angry with men who shed innocent blood.
There can never be peace between nations until it is first known that true peace is within the souls of men.

Only two relationships are possible -- to be a friend or to be an enemy.

Wishing cannot bring autumn glory nor cause winter to cease.
Men in search of a myth will usually find one.
Is it not better for one hundred to pray for one than for one to pray alone for himself?
Teachers not only teach, but they also learn.
Flowers are for our souls to enjoy.
The grandfathers and the grandmothers are in the children; teach them well.
It is not good for anyone to be alone.
One falsehood spoils a thousand truths.
Do not call the forest that shelters you a jungle.

The ruin of a nation begins in the homes of its people.
No one tests the depth of a river with both feet.
Rain does not fall on one roof alone.
Children are the reward of life.
A little subtleness is better than a lot of force.

When spider webs unite, they can tie up a lion.
When there is no shame, there is no honor.

He who has done evil, expects evil.
A little rain each day will fill the rivers to overflowing.
Life is a shadow and a mist; it passes quickly by, and is no more.
Evil knows where evil sleeps.
He who is being carried does not realize how far the town is.
What the child says, he has heard at home.
When the mouse laughs at the cat, there is a hole nearby.
Not to know is bad; not to wish to know is worse.

When you know who his friend is, you know who he is.

Quarrels end, but words once spoken never die.
We start as fools and become wise through experience.
Follow the customs or flee the country.
The miracle is not to fly in the air, or to walk on the water, but to walk on the earth.

There is only one time when it is essential to awaken.  That time is now.
One kind word can warm three winter months.

Give thanks for unknown blessings already on their way.
Anger can be an expensive luxury.
It is not the man who has too little, but the man who craves more, that is poor.

Instruction in youth is like engraving in stones.

Although no one can go back and make a brand new start, anyone can start from now and make a brand new ending.
Once we have found the true path, destiny unfolds before us like a red carpet.
My intuition is the sensitive radar of the spirit.  With its aid I can fly a true course through any storm.

Those who believe themselves greater than others secretly fear themselves less.
No one outside myself can rule me inwardly.  Knowing this I become wholly free.

May the Great Spirit's blessings always be with you.
Listen or your tongue will keep you deaf.

Do not speak of evil, for it creates curiosity in the minds of the young.
My heart laughs with joy because I am in your presence.
Happiness is not only good in itself but it is very healthful.
Be happy in order to live long.  Worry makes you sick.

When an idea exclusively occupies the mind, it is transformed into an actual physical state.

No man fears what he has seen grow.

When there is no enemy within, the enemies outside cannot hurt you.

Ashes fly back into the face of him who throws them.
Don't set sail on someone else's star.

People show their character by what they laugh at.
You can't stop a pig from wallowing in the mud.

The fly on the water buffalo's back thinks he is taller than the water buffalo.
If you buy things you don't need you will soon be selling things you do need.

All experience is education for the soul.

Each person is his own judge.
